highlighted_projects.description: Analyzed mortgage customer data using regression analysis and principal component analysis to identify key loan risk factors, improving risk assessment and accuracy.
highlighted_projects.name: Loan Risk Analysis Using Regression and PCA

highlighted_projects.description: Used SQL queries, joins, and analytical techniques to identify attrition drivers for a mortgage lender and recommended process improvements.
highlighted_projects.name: Customer Attrition Analysis for Mortgage Lender

highlighted_projects.description: Designed and implemented an ARIMA-based inventory forecasting system for five Tim Hortons locations as a capstone project, improving inventory planning.
highlighted_projects.name: Inventory Forecasting System for Tim Hortons

jarvis_projects.description: Developed a Linux-based cluster monitoring agent to collect, store, and analyze system resource usage metrics such as CPU, memory, and disk utilization. Implemented Bash scripts to automate data collection and scheduling using cron jobs, and stored metrics in a PostgreSQL database for querying and analysis. This project demonstrates proficiency in Linux, Bash scripting, Docker, PostgreSQL, and system-level monitoring in a production-like environment.
jarvis_projects.name: Linux Cluster Monitoring Agent

jarvis_projects.description: Designed and implemented a relational database solution using PostgreSQL to support business data analysis and reporting requirements. Created database schemas, tables, and constraints, and wrote complex SQL queries involving joins, subqueries, aggregate functions, and window functions to extract actionable insights. This project reflects a Business Systems Analyst approach by translating business requirements into structured data models and analytical queries.
jarvis_projects.name: RDBMS and SQL Data Analysis Project

professional_experience.description: Analyzed business and technical requirements and translated them into structured data models, SQL queries, and analytical solutions as part of enterprise-style consulting projects. Collaborated on system design, database implementation, and data validation activities while supporting monitoring, reporting, and decision-making use cases using PostgreSQL, SQL, Linux, and analytical workflows.
professional_experience.title: Business Systems Analyst

professional_experience.description: Analyzed business data, built dashboards, and automated reports while collaborating with cross- functional teams to deliver actionable insights that improved decision-making and supported strategic objectives.
professional_experience.title: Data Analyst Intern

professional_experience.description: Led digital image processing initiatives for a leading camera brand by analyzing and enhancing raw sensor image data using OpenCV, MATLAB, and Visual Studio to improve overall image quality.
professional_experience.title: Embedded Software Engineer

summary: Business Systems Analytics professional with over four years of experience in data analysis, software engineering, and applied analytics across technology and consulting environments. Skilled in Python, SQL, Power BI, and statistical analysis, with hands-on experience delivering dashboards, automated reports, and data-driven insights to support strategic decision-making. Holds a postgraduate certificate in Business Insights and Analytics and has worked on real-world projects involving risk analysis, customer attrition, and inventory forecasting.
